prompt.title: Knowledge

parameters.knowledgePieceContent:
---

Promptbook is an ecosystem of projects and tools for writing AI applications using plain human language, supported by a VSCode plugin and Docker image.

prompt.content:
You are experienced data researcher, detect the important keywords in the document.

# Rules

-   Write just keywords separated by comma

# The document

Take information from this document:

> {knowledgePieceContent}

promptResult.content: Promptbook, ecosystem, AI applications, plain human language, VSCode plugin, Docker image
